A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think the movie was very good. The story did a good job breaking the mold. The force awakens followed a story very similar to a new hope with different characters and a bigger death star. However this one borrows elements from both empire and return of the Jedi and does new things with them. It sets up the next movie very well and gives us a bit of that I don't know what to expect. The people complaining right now would have probably rather seen a remake of the original trilogy. I do not understand why so many people are so down on this movie.
